nirvana.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the final state of complete knowledge and understanding that is the aim of believers in Buddhism
nirvana.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a condition of great happiness and a feeling of peace
nirvana.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a US group who developed a new style of rock music called grunge, which was popular in the early 1990s, and whose lead singer was Kurt Cobain. Their albums include Nevermind  and In Utero.
